text: Johan Ferdinand Nyström (April 16, 1874 – September 30, 1968) was a Swedish track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. to not Nyström competed in the marathon. He was one of six runners who failed to finish the event. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. title: Johan Nyström (athlete)
